extended_tooltips.text: Mark is applied to up to <d ref="duckiesHeroRykerMark_AOEStartSearch.max_targets" style="Bold"/> additional enemies next to primary target.
When a marked unit dies the mark will spread to another nearby enemy.
Effect is diminished against resilient and boss enemies.

name: Mark
tooltip: Marks target enemy, causing it to take <d ref="(duckiesHeroRykerMark_DebuffDRNormal.modify_fraction-1)*100" style="Blue"/><Blue>%</> more damage for <d ref="duckiesHeroRykerMark_DebuffNormal.duration"/> seconds.
